dcterms:description: The MIT GazeCapture dataset is a comprehensive collection of eye movement data collected from a diverse set of participants engaged in various activities using smartphones. It includes JSON files with bounding box coordinates for eyes and faces, along with frame, face detection, and eye detection statistics, making it suitable for evaluating gaze tracking models.
dcterms:title: MIT GazeCapture dataset
